meanings.sent1: Loud noises deadens my sense of hearing.
meanings.sent2: The medication deadens the pain in my arm.
meanings.sent3: The boring lecture deadens my interest in the subject.
meanings.sent4: The gray sky deadens the vibrant colors of the flowers.
meanings.sent5: The fog deadens the sounds of the bustling city streets.

meanings.definition: To make or become less lively, intense, or active.
meanings.sent1: The rain deadens the excitement of the outdoor event.
meanings.sent2: The lack of sunlight deadens the mood of the room.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy music deadens the energy of the party.
meanings.sent4: The long wait deadens the anticipation of the surprise.
meanings.sent5: The cold weather deadens the activity in the park.
